author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three flights heading to Bengaluru were diverted to the Chennai Airport on Tuesday morning due to poor visibility and fog.

Three domestic airlines, two arriving from Mumbai and one from Hyderabad, which were supposed to land there in the morning were diverted to Chennai between 8 and 8:30 am.

After being stranded at the airport, passengers boarded their respective flights at 10:30 am.
title: Flights diverted
